title: Backend Developer
description: Led a team of 5 to build FoodApe, a food ordering app serving 30,000+ VIT-AP students.
Designed a monolithic backend, improving scalability by 30% and reducing latency by 25%.
Integrated ML-based food recommendations to enhance user experience.

title: Contributor
description: Streamlined course registration for 120,000+ VIT students each semester.
Reduced average course selection time by 40% through a guided flow and faster UI.
Improved user satisfaction by 70%, based on survey feedback.
